Thanks to the wonderful [Jackie Danicki](http://www.jackiedanicki.com/http:/www.jackiedanicki.com/12seconds-invites-up-for-grabs), I’m now playing with the new “Twitter for video” service, [12 Seconds](http://12seconds.tv/channel/adders/). This idea is simple. Just as Twitter restricts you to 140 characters, 12 Seconds restricts you to…
…well, you can work it out.
[Not Today](http://12seconds.tv/channel/adders/20966) on [12seconds.tv](http://embed.12seconds.tv)
